code: export var WS_CONNECTION_START="WS_CONNECTION_START";export var WS_CONNECTION_SUCCESS="WS_CONNECTION_SUCCESS";export var WS_CONNECTION_ERROR="WS_CONNECTION_ERROR";export var WS_CONNECTION_CLOSED="WS_CONNECTION_CLOSED";export var WS_GET_ORDERS="WS_GET_ORDERS";export var OPEN_WS_MODAL="OPEN_WS_MODAL";export var CLOSE_WS_MODAL="CLOSE_WS_MODAL";export var wsConnectionStartAction=function wsConnectionStartAction(withToken,payload){return{type:WS_CONNECTION_START,withToken:withToken,payload:payload};};export var wsConnectionSuccessAction=function wsConnectionSuccessAction(){return{type:WS_CONNECTION_SUCCESS};};export var wsConnectionErrorAction=function wsConnectionErrorAction(){return{type:WS_CONNECTION_ERROR};};export var wsConnectionClosedAction=function wsConnectionClosedAction(){return{type:WS_CONNECTION_CLOSED};};export var wsGetAction=function wsGetAction(orders){return{type:WS_GET_ORDERS,orders:orders};};export var wsOpenModal=function wsOpenModal(){return{type:OPEN_WS_MODAL};};export var wsCloseModal=function wsCloseModal(){return{type:CLOSE_WS_MODAL};};export var wsActions={wsInit:WS_CONNECTION_START,onOpen:WS_CONNECTION_SUCCESS,onClose:WS_CONNECTION_CLOSED,onError:WS_CONNECTION_ERROR,onGetOrders:WS_GET_ORDERS,wsOpenModal:OPEN_WS_MODAL,wsCloseModal:CLOSE_WS_MODAL};
